name: Foxingdale (The Magical stones of Kentaroo)
description:
Explore the Kingdom of Foxingdale in this retro CD-I action adventure game, 90s Anime aesthetics inspired by Zelda the wand of Gamelon





The evil sorcerer of the Northern kingdoms in search of the lost Magical stones of Kentaroo,
Legend has it that whoever possess the Magical stones will become the most powerful ruler of all the kingdoms.
A brave adventurer by the name of Aoi must set out on a quest to find The lost stones of Kentaroo before they fall into the wrong hands



  • Travel around the Realm of FoxingDale by using a open world map to explore
  • Experience a 2D Retro CD-I adventure
  • Amazing pre-rendered digital images for nostalgic aesthetics
  • Classic 2D side scroller
  • Hand drawn fantasy world anime
    • Streamlined gaming Action, for a faster casual enjoyable experience



    You play as Aoi a would`be adventurer who must set out on a quest to find the three Magical stones of Kentaroo
    To find the stones you must travel through the realm of foxingdale by using your map to select a kingdom to explore, talk to the towns folk of foxingdale to help guide you on your quest.
    Watch out for Masked raiders and bandits sent by the evil sorcerer, who are also looking for the Magical stones , you must protect yourself by using your short sword to attack your enemys including dragons and elfs who will cross your path
